errors.error_description: The guide suggests downgrading pip to an outdated version (19.0), which can cause compatibility issues with modern packages and should not be required.
correction_candidates: Replace `pip install --upgrade pip==19.0` with `pip install --upgrade pip>=22.0`.
Replace the entire installation section with `python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install vkbottle`.
Remove the instruction to downgrade pip. The default `pip install vkbottle` is sufficient.
Replace `pip install --upgrade pip==19.0` with `pip install pip --force-reinstall`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the instruction to downgrade pip. The default `pip install vkbottle` is sufficient.

errors.error_description: The link to the contribution guide points to a non-existent file path 'docs/CONTRIBUTING.md' instead of the correct 'CONTRIBUTION_GUIDE.md' in the root directory.
